messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Re:Introduction and question:  Is unschooling pe...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/5/2003 10:16:10 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... You re so sweet and even-tempered! And HELPFUL!  I tend to roll my eyes and turn away!
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/5/2003 10:16:10 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
KathrynJB@... writes:


> If you have a conflict, there's time and energy to work it out and find
> solutions
> without having to rush off to the next thing, and everyone has more reason
> to
> make an effort to get along. People seem to really get that.

You're so sweet and even-tempered! And HELPFUL! <G>

I tend to roll my eyes and turn away! But I hear that SOOO much!

My snarky answer lately is: "If you think you can or you think you can't,
you're right."

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
